item.description:
Paul Brown Monday Night Jazz Series presented by Prudential Financial.

The series will run on consecutive Mondays through August 6.

Bushnell Park, Hartford, CT 06115


July 23, 2007 6 pm Kelly Sheppard Quintet / 7:30 pm Paul West Quintet

July 30, 2007 6 pm Jessie ?Cheese? Hameen II / 7:30 pm Rufus Reid Quintet

August 6, 2007 6 pm Fred Simmons Quartet / 7:30 pm Barry Harris Quartet

Monday Night Jazz

Once an Organizer is confirmed, this site will be updated as to how to locate him/her. Any volunteers?

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: Monday Night Jazz Series - Bushnell Park, Hartford 6-9
